meanings.definition: Resembling a shelf in appearance or structure.
meanings.sent1: The shelfy bookcase was sturdy and practical.
meanings.sent2: The shelfy wall unit provided ample storage space.
meanings.sent3: The shelfy table looked like it could hold a mountain of books!
meanings.sent4: Her hair, piled high on her head, had a shelfy quality to it.
meanings.sent5: The shelfy clouds in the sky seemed to be holding up the sun.

meanings.sent1: The shelfy cabinet had compartments for all her belongings.
meanings.sent2: The shelfy closet was perfect for organizing clothes and shoes.
meanings.sent3: The shelfy shoe rack made her feel like she was in a shoe store.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range had a shelfy appearance, with layers of rock jutting out.
meanings.sent5: The shelfy tree branches provided perches for many birds.

meanings.definition: Suitable for or capable of being placed on a shelf.
meanings.sent1: The small shelfy figurine fit perfectly on the bookshelf.
meanings.sent2: The shelfy box was just the right size to store her trinkets.
meanings.sent3: The shelfy mug was a great addition to her collection.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like shelfy objects, neatly arranged and easily accessible.
meanings.sent5: The shelfy vase displayed the flowers beautifully on the mantelpiece.
